balangoda pradeshaye pasal sisunge jangama durakathanawalata asabhya darshana athulu kara mudal gath bawa kiyana pudgalayaku athadanguwata gena thibe.polisiya sandahan kale, balangoda aluth nuwara pradeshaye durakathana sewa madhyasthanayaka thibu ewani andame asabhya darshana athulath pariganakayak saha jangama durakathana kihipayak da soya ganimata haki wu bawayi.kalaka sita mema jawarama pilibandawa demapiyangen saha atham guruwarungen thorathuru labi thibu bawa da polisiya pawasiya.sakakaru ada balangoda mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata niyamithayi.
